#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<cassert>

using namespace std;

#define s(n)                        scanf("%d",&n)
using namespace std;
int testnum;


int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a;
}

int N;
void solve()
{
    int phi = 0;
    for(int i = 1; i < N; i++)
        if(gcd(i,N) == 1)
            phi ++;
    printf("%d\n", phi);
}



bool input()
{
    s(N);
    assert( 2 <= N && N <= 10000);
    return true;
}


int main()
{
    int T; s(T);
    assert(1 <= T && T <= 100);
    for(testnum=1;testnum<=T;testnum++)
    {
        if(!input()) break;
        solve();
    }
}
